features.name: Wallet Tags

features.name: Find Gems
features.desc: Find Gems is a feature that helps user identify potential Tokens at the current time.

features.name: Alert
features.desc: Alert is feature that allows users to set up notifications for the types of information they want to receive.

services.name: Token Data
services.desc: Search anything onchain.User our APIs for advanced searches, filtering tailored queries with highly processed token and wallet data.

services.name: DEFI Data
services.desc: Flexible data types to power any DeFi use case. Birdeye provides key forms of instantaneous token prices to dApps, DEXs, and other platforms.

services.name: Wallet Data
services.desc: Add real-time prices, transaction data and security checks to your users can trade emerging crytocurrencies as soon as they hit the market.
